strings.label.baseline.noChanges: Babu wasu canje-canje da aka gano.
strings.modal.title: Sakamakon fitarwa
strings.modal.subtitle: Zaɓi tsari:
strings.results.brief.title: Takaitaccen bayani
strings.results.extensive.title: Faɗakarwar bincike
strings.label.routerFirmware: na'ura mai ba da hanya tsakanin hanyoyin sadarwa
strings.label.name: suna
strings.note.skipped: tsallake (gudu mai yawa don gwajin gudun)
strings.note.noIssues: Ba a sami matsala nan take ba. Tsarin yayi kama da lafiya.
strings.suggest.checklist.brief: Fara lissafin aiki: tabbatar da an shigar da mahimman kayan aikin kuma yana aiki.
strings.suggest.checklist.extensive: Mafi girman lissafin aikin aiki: mayar da hankali kan matakan da ke inganta sauri da inganci.
strings.suggest.memory.low: Ƙananan ƙwaƙwalwar ajiyar kyauta: rufe aikace-aikacen da ba a yi amfani da su ba ko sake farawa zuwa RAM kyauta.
strings.suggest.memory.veryHigh: Amfani da RAM>= 90%: rufe manyan apps, dakatar da ginawa, ko haɓaka tsarin RAM.
strings.suggest.memory.high: Amfani da RAM> = 80%: la'akari da rufe aikace-aikacen ko haɓaka RAM idan wannan na kowa ne.
strings.suggest.memory.reserve: Kiyaye RAM 20% kyauta don ayyukan cache da OS; 10% shine mafi ƙarancin don gujewa raguwa.
strings.suggest.cpu.high: Babban kaya CPU: duba Task Manager don matakai masu nauyi.
strings.suggest.internet.failed: Binciken Intanet ya gaza: tabbatar da haɗin yanar gizon ku ko Tacewar zaɓi.
strings.suggest.internet.latency: Babban jinkirin intanit: gwada canza hanyoyin sadarwa ko sake kunna na'ura mai ba da hanya tsakanin hanyoyin sadarwa.
strings.suggest.os.updates: macOS akwai sabuntawa: shigar da sabbin abubuwan sabuntawa.
strings.suggest.gpu.full: Gudanar da cikakken bincike don haɗawa da _TOK_4__ da aiwatar da cikakkun bayanai.
strings.suggest.ide.cap: _TOK_13__ IDE an gano hula: ƙara girman IDE idan aikin yana jinkirin.
strings.suggest.wifi.weak: Siginar Wi-Fi mai rauni (<60%): matsa kusa da na'ura mai ba da hanya tsakanin hanyoyin sadarwa ko canza zuwa Ethernet.
strings.suggest.wifi.weakRssi: Siginar Wi-Fi mara ƙarfi (ƙananan RSSI): matsa kusa da na'ura mai ba da hanya tsakanin hanyoyin sadarwa ko canza zuwa Ethernet.
strings.suggest.power.plan: Ba a saita tsarin wutar lantarki zuwa babban aiki: canzawa zuwa Mafi Kyau/Mafi Girma yayin ƙididdigewa ko gini.
strings.suggest.vscode.extensions: _TOK_12__: kashe kari da ba a yi amfani da shi ba kuma cire manyan fayilolin gini/fitarwa daga kallon fayil da bincike.
strings.suggest.jetbrains.tune: JetBrains IDEs: kashe plugins da ba a yi amfani da su ba, cire kayan aikin da aka gina daga firikwensin, da ɗaga girman tsibi idan an buƙata.
strings.suggest.vs.parallel: _TOK_16__: ba da damar gina aikin layi daya da sauke ayyukan da ba a yi amfani da su ba don rage lokacin lodin bayani.
strings.suggest.xcode.derived: Xcode: tsaftace bayanan da aka samo lokacin da ake yin ƙididdiga ko haɓaka lokutan haɓaka.
strings.suggest.android.accel: _TOK_15__: ba da damar haɓaka kayan aikin kwaikwayi kuma adana cache Gradle akan ma'aji mai sauri.
strings.suggest.node.lts: _TOK_10__: Yi amfani da sabuwar sakin LTS kuma ku ci gaba da dogaro da aikin akan ma'ajiyar SSD.
strings.suggest.ts.incremental: _TOK_11__: ba da damar haɓaka haɓakawa ko nassoshi na ayyuka don manyan lambobi.
strings.suggest.python.venv: Python: yi amfani da mahallin kama-da-wane don kiyaye shigarwa cikin ware da sauri.
strings.suggest.java.lts: Java: yi amfani da LTS JDK na yanzu kuma kunna caches (Gradle/Maven) don sake ginawa cikin sauri.
strings.suggest.docker.windows: Docker Desktop (Windows): yi amfani da baya na WSL2 kuma kunna iyakoki CPU/RAM don aikinka.
strings.suggest.docker.mac: Docker Desktop (macOS): kunna iyakoki CPU/RAM da raba fayil (VirtioFS idan akwai).
strings.checklist.osDrivers: Sabunta _TOK_7__ da direbobin na'ura (GPU, Chipset, Wi-Fi/LAN) zuwa sabbin juzu'ai masu tsayayye.
strings.checklist.powerPlan: Yi amfani da tsarin wutar lantarki mai Babban Ayyuka/Mafi kyawun Aiki yayin ƙididdigewa ko gini.
strings.checklist.startupApps: Kashe ko datsa ƙa'idodin farawa da ayyukan baya da ba ku amfani da su.
strings.checklist.diskSpace: Ajiye aƙalla 20% sarari diski kyauta; gudanar da tsaftace faifai kuma cire manyan fayilolin ɗan lokaci.
strings.checklist.ssd: Fi son ajiyar SSD don ayyukan; kauce wa nauyi ginawa a kan jinkirin waje tafiyarwa.
strings.checklist.visualEffects: Rage tasirin gani / rayarwa don snappier UI.
strings.checklist.antivirus: Ware manyan fayilolin aikin (node_modules, gini, disst) daga binciken riga-kafi na ainihi.
strings.checklist.wifi: Yi amfani da Ethernet ko mai ƙarfi 5GHz Wi-Fi; sabunta firmware na na'ura mai ba da hanya tsakanin hanyoyin sadarwa kuma sake yi lokaci-lokaci.
strings.checklist.dns: Saita DNS zuwa mai bada sauri kuma tabbatar da rashin jinkiri don saukewar fakiti.
strings.checklist.browser: Iyakanta shafukan burauza da rufe aikace-aikace masu nauyi yayin ginawa.
strings.checklist.hwAccel: Kunna hanzarin kayan masarufi inda aka goyan baya (mai lilo / IDE).
strings.checklist.cliTools: Ci gaba da sabunta kayan aikin CLI (Node.js, npm, Git, Docker, Java).
strings.checklist.reboot: Sake yi bayan manyan sabuntawa don share matakan da ba su da kyau da maƙullai.
strings.note.speedtest.unavailable: Babu majiyoyin gwaji mafi sauri da suka amsa.
strings.note.speedtest.singleSource: Sakamakon ya dogara ne akan tushe ɗaya.
strings.note.speedtest.captive: An gano tashar da aka kama; an katange gwajin sauri.
strings.note.speedtest.uploadUnavailable: Gwajin lodi ya gaza; zazzagewa/ping kawai.
